name: UpdateAccountSettings
description: Update a specific Voice Insights Setting.

AdvancedFeatures.description: A boolean flag to enable Advanced Features for Voice Insights.

SubaccountSid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Subaccount.

VoiceTrace.description: A boolean flag to enable Voice Trace.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Account.
**advanced_features**: A boolean flag indicating whether Advanced Features for Voice Insights are enabled.
**voice_trace**: A boolean flag indicating whether Voice Trace is enabled.
